body_html:
@vit-stepanovs , Thanks for the info.

I have followed the adding all obj file solution and it works. However, it will be great to have lib version (with small amounts of libs). I added /WHOLEARCHIVE compiler option (on Visual Studi 2015 Update 3) to the tf_label_image_example application project with the lib dependencies. It gives the same error as for @derofim:

LNK1000: Internal error during CImplib::EmitThunk

To verify whether this is a configuration issue with my setup, has anyone managed to build static libraries and link them to an application through Visual Studio/CMake project. Or is it a Visual Studio issue with these specific libraries?

@andydavis1, could you open the issue till a static library solution can be found or if needed till a bug report can be reported for visual studio/Cmake project? Thanks.
